refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These units will print orchestra init-values.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: print -- print the current value of the i-time arguments (or expressions) iarg at every i-pass through the instrument.

note.para: The print opcode will truncate decimal places and may not show the complete value. Csound's precision depends on whether it is the floats (32-bit) or double (64-bit) version, since most internal calculations use one of these formats. If you need more resolution in the console output, you can try printf.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the print opcode. It uses the file print.csd.
Example of the print opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
Its output should include lines like these:
instr 1: irand = 2.930 instr 1: irand = 0.420 instr 1: irand = 2.316
